# defaultAction

**Instance Property**

The default action to take for flows of network data that don’t match any of the specified rules.

## Declaration

```swift
var defaultAction: NEFilterAction { get }
```

## Inspecting Filter Settings

- **rules**: An ordered list of rules that define the filter’s operation.

items.description: An ordered list of rules that define the filter’s operation.
